void Aurora.Framework.ThreadMonitor.StartMonitor ( int  timesToIterate,
int  sleepTime 
)

Start the thread and run through the threads that are given.

Parameters:
timesToIterate The number of times to run the delegate.

If you set this parameter to 0, it will loop infinitely.

Parameters:
sleepTime The sleep time between each iteration.

If you set this parameter to 0, it will loop without sleeping at all. The sleeping will have to be deal with in the delegates.

void Aurora.Framework.ThreadMonitor.StartTrackingThread ( int  millisecondTimeOut,
Heartbeat  hb 
)

Add this delegate to the tracker so that it can run.

Parameters:
millisecondTimeOut The time that the thread can run before it is forcefully stopped.
hb The delegate to run.
